overview: Danger Danger, featuring Ted Poley and Bruno Ravel, performing at Firefest IX on Sunday 21st of October 2012, at Rock City, Nottingham, in the United Kingdom.  Setlist: Rock America Beat the Bullet Shot o' Love Killin' Love Don't Walk Away Don't Blame It on Love Hearts on the Highway Feels Like Love Bang Bang I Still Think About You Crazy Nites  Encore: Monkey Business Naughty Naughty
title: Danger Danger Live at Firefest 2012
